column4: Question: On a side note, is there a "using ubuntu" channel for ubuntu beginners? I'd like to learn from there, and helpout as i gain usage knowledge
But i'll make sure to wiki up before asking

Question: Also, is there a good list of top linux programs? I'll be wanting a lot of software here and there, all of which i can't predict now. Stuff like CD/DVD Drive Emulators, Good mp3 players, etc.
Synaptic Package Manager has a *mammoth* list of easily installable programs.
